languages.text: "Мутанты козни строят". {n}Кляйн с отвращением сплевывает.{/n} "Расплодились ублюдки, страх потеряли, вот и осмелели. Наверняка они пытались заразить Вашу Светлость своей скверной".
"The mutants are plotting." {n}Klein spits in disgust.{/n} "They've been breeding like void rats, so they're getting cocky. Must have wanted to infect Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} with their plague."

languages.text: « Encore un complot des mutants, {n}crache Klein avec dégoût.{/n} Ils se reproduisent comme des rats, et ils deviennent un peu trop sûrs d'eux. Ils cherchaient sans doute à contaminer Votre Seigneurie avec leurs miasmes. »
languages.original_text: "The mutants are plotting." {n}Klein spits in disgust.{/n} "They've been breeding like void rats, so they're getting cocky. Must have wanted to infect Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} with their plague."

traits.locale_text: « Encore un complot des mutants, {n}crache Klein avec dégoût.{/n} Ils se reproduisent comme des rats, et ils deviennent un peu trop sûrs d'eux. Ils cherchaient sans doute à contaminer Votre Seigneurie avec leurs miasmes. »

languages.text: «Los mutantes están conspirando». {n}Klein escupe al suelo, asqueado.{/n} «Se han estado reproduciendo como ratas del vacío y ahora se están envalentonando. Querrían infectar a mi{mf|lord|lady} con su plaga».
languages.original_text: "The mutants are plotting." {n}Klein spits in disgust.{/n} "They've been breeding like void rats, so they're getting cocky. Must have wanted to infect Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} with their plague."

traits.locale_text: «Los mutantes están conspirando». {n}Klein escupe al suelo, asqueado.{/n} «Se han estado reproduciendo como ratas del vacío y ahora se están envalentonando. Querrían infectar a mi{mf|lord|lady} con su plaga».

languages.text: “那些变种人在酝酿阴谋。”{n}克莱因厌恶地唾了一口。{/n}“他们一直像老鼠一样孜孜不倦地繁殖，以为自己成气候了。他们肯定是打算把瘟疫传染给您。”
languages.original_text: "The mutants are plotting." {n}Klein spits in disgust.{/n} "They've been breeding like void rats, so they're getting cocky. Must have wanted to infect Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} with their plague."

traits.locale_text: “那些变种人在酝酿阴谋。”{n}克莱因厌恶地唾了一口。{/n}“他们一直像老鼠一样孜孜不倦地繁殖，以为自己成气候了。他们肯定是打算把瘟疫传染给您。”

languages.text: 「変異体は企んでいます」{n}クラインは呆れたように吐き捨てた。{/n}「奴らはネズミのように繁殖し、生意気になっている。きっと、陛下を疫病に感染させたかったのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The mutants are plotting." {n}Klein spits in disgust.{/n} "They've been breeding like void rats, so they're getting cocky. Must have wanted to infect Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} with their plague."

traits.locale_text: 「変異体は企んでいます」{n}クラインは呆れたように吐き捨てた。{/n}「奴らはネズミのように繁殖し、生意気になっている。きっと、陛下を疫病に感染させたかったのでしょう」

languages.text: "Die Mutanten schmieden Intrigen"{n}, spuckt Klein angewidert aus.{/n} "Sie vermehren sich wie die Leerenratten, daher werden sie übermütig. Sie wollten Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} wohl mit ihrer Seuche infizieren."
languages.original_text: "The mutants are plotting." {n}Klein spits in disgust.{/n} "They've been breeding like void rats, so they're getting cocky. Must have wanted to infect Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} with their plague."

traits.locale_text: "Die Mutanten schmieden Intrigen"{n}, spuckt Klein angewidert aus.{/n} "Sie vermehren sich wie die Leerenratten, daher werden sie übermütig. Sie wollten Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} wohl mit ihrer Seuche infizieren."

languages.text: "Mutantlar komplo kuruyor." {n}Klein, iğrenerek yere tükürüyor.{/n} "Uçsuz sıçanları gibi üreyip duruyor, ondan da kendilerini bir şey sanıyorlar. Muhtemelen hastalıklarını {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne bulaştırmak istediler."
languages.original_text: "The mutants are plotting." {n}Klein spits in disgust.{/n} "They've been breeding like void rats, so they're getting cocky. Must have wanted to infect Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} with their plague."
